name: Summer Beach Family Holidays
description:
Summer Beach Family Holidays is a real adventure game for girls and kids on these upcoming summer holidays. Kids are getting ready with their parents to travel around the world for making their summer holidays more memorable and stunning. Parents want their kids to enjoy the summer holidays at beach side to get more vitamins D in their body. Feel the fun of Ice Cream making and decoration on beach side ice cream shop. Mom hand made ice cream will give you a nice taste. Let’s get ready for the beach dressUp for safety reasons. Collect the jewelry, make sandcastles, sand made houses, madhouses and treat the seaside injured turtle. Wear the sun glasses, summer shirts, caps and play with football on seaside sand.

Beach activities for Kids and Girls …!!!!

* Make drinks and ice cream from different fruits
* Beach Art and mud houses with sea shells
* Relay Race & sand castles
* Explore the tide pools
* Beach Yoga & beach mermaid with sand
* Build a sand man and make pictures or selfies
* Beach ball relay game & create sand animals
* Beach ball toss and musical towels
* Create a beach tent
* Organize a family sport like olympics
* Create beach tic-tac-toe
* Beach Skee ball sand game
* Create Sand darts game

You can consider the possibilities of camping near the beach. You can visit someone in your family of friends circle who lives by the beach. With your kids you can visit to tropical island and book a resort stay. You can pack the plenty of beach activities things like swimsuits, flip flops sandals, t-shirt and light weight jacket, sunscreen, insect repellent, aloe vera or after sun cream for sandbank party. You may enjoy some night parties on the beach like a large bonfire and throw a party. Take photos in sunrise and sunset over the beach. Visit the local restaurants , cafes and beach bars.


Make your kids summer holidays more memorable and enjoyable. It is the free summer camp beach activities game for kids. You can makeover your kids with beach outfits before beach activities. You can wait for our upcoming cooking, dress up, makeup and makeover games. Remember, It is the FREE beach party Game to have some real Fun.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
